item.description:
I know it's short notice, but the
CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club has invited the Ethnic Dining Meetup Group to join them for this Movie Night event. You can RSVP here or on their Meetup site, or just show up and look for the guy with the VIP Entertainment T-Shirt in the lobby (small theater, easy to find him!).

WHAT: The Bourne Ultimatum

WHERE: The Parkade Cinemas and Entertainment
308 Broad St
Manchester,CT 06040
(860) 647-1439

WHEN: Thursday, October 18 at 7 PM

The CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club is able to get everyone the discounted ticket price of $3.75!

After the movie, join us across the street in the Manchester Parkade at:

Time-Out Sports Bar & Grill
346 West Middle Turnpike
(Manchester Parkade)
Manchester, CT 06040
649-7400

Located directly across the parking lot from the Parkade Cinemas

All CTNites.com VIP Clubbers will receive a 10% discount on everything!

We will be handing out VIP Entertainment Club cards which will give the clubbers $3.75 admission to the Parkade Cinemas and a 10% discount at Time-Out anytime!

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: PARKADE CINEMA - BOURNE ULTIMATUM
